name: FindthePuppy
0:
”Alexa, play Find the Puppy”
”Alexa, start Find the Puppy”
”Alexa, tell Find the Puppy to play in a small house”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: find the puppy
des:
Your puppy wants to play hide and seek! He's hiding in the house and needs you to find him.

To begin the game, just say, "Alexa, start Find the Puppy."

You will start in the entryway and will need to move from room to room until you find the puppy.

Listen closely for the colors and directions of the doors in each room. To move to the next room, you can either say the door color or the direction. For example:
• open the blue door
• go to the left

HINTS
• Some doors will be open. Those are rooms where you've already been.
• Listen for the puppy. The barking will be louder when you're getting closer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
